sys_documentation.help: When editing a transaction, the Item Description selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of the Item Description field. When adding a new transaction, the selected item description will specify the Item Description, as well as this lookup field.
sys_documentation.hint: When editing a transaction, the Item Description selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of the Item Description field. When adding a new transaction, the selected item description will specify the Item Description, as well as this lookup field.
sys_documentation.label: Item Description Lookup
sys_documentation.name: x_561190_micro_p_0_transactions
